Home » 40P15 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
7 Hetuduka, Pītittika
Hetuduka, Pītittika
15.
41Hetuṃ pītisahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu napītisahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
42Hetuṃ sukhasahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasukhasahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
43Hetuṃ upekkhāsahagataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naupekkhāsahagato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā… . Hetuyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
